descriptions_eng: Develop and maintain in-house and clients' software mainly for cinema and television.
Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Ruby on Rails, among others.
Architect and implement front-end solutions for different clients including Netflix, Sony Pictures, Telemundo, RCN and more.
descriptions_esp: Desarrollar y mantener software dedicado para producción de cine y televisión.
Trabajar con varios lenguajes, plataformas, frameworks como JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Ruby on Rails, entre otros.
Proponer e implementar arquitecturas y soluciones front-end para diferentes clientes como Netflix, Sony Pictures, Telemundo, RCN, etc.
